wikipedia_page.main:
Michael "Lloyd" McIver (born 2 March 1986) is a Gaelic footballer who plays for the Derry county team, with whom he has won a National League title. McIver plays his club football for Ballinderry Shamrocks, and has won the Derry Senior Football Championship twice with the club.
For both club and county McIver usually plays in half back line, but has also played corner back.

response: *Ryan Dillon (QUB), Mark Lynch (UUJ), Barry McGoldrick and Michael McIver (both St. Mary's) all represented their college sides during the McKenna Cup, as they have first choice over players for the competition.
